meanings.definition: A place where alcoholic drinks are served.
meanings.sent1: I went to the pub with my friends after work.
meanings.sent2: The pub down the street has a great selection of beers.
meanings.sent3: The pub was so crowded that I had to shout my order to the bartender.
meanings.sent4: The pub was a beacon of warmth and laughter on a cold winter night.
meanings.sent5: The neon sign outside the pub flickered invitingly, drawing us in.

meanings.definition: A public house where people gather to drink and socialize.
meanings.sent1: The local pub is a popular spot for the community to come together.
meanings.sent2: We always have a good time at the pub on Friday nights.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally left my hat at the pub, and now it's become a conversation starter.
meanings.sent4: The pub was a hub of stories and shared laughter.
meanings.sent5: The cozy atmosphere of the pub enveloped us like a warm hug.
